title: Business Development Representative
salary: $700 USD a month + 10% of monthly commissions from all accountss
job_overview:
Looking for an excellent English speaking individual who sounds American with a great phone presence. Someone who knows how to engage on a cold call and knows how to convince business owners to use our digital service. This is a huge opportunity for any good quality sales people looking to join a rapidly growing startup. Each client will produce passive monthly commissions into your pocket, so the sky is truly the limit in regards to income.

Needs to be:
- Confident
- Speak great English
- Knows how to navigate emails
- willing to cold call
- understands the art of sales and not taking no for an answer

Must Apply Through The Link Upgrade to see actual info
